titles.title: Indigent Funeral Expense Reimbursement Act of 2011
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit for unreimbursed funeral expenses with respect to a deceased indigent individual.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/11/2011--Introduced. Indigent Funeral Expense Reimbursement Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow taxpayers engaged in the the trade or business of providing funeral or burial goods and services a business-related tax credit for the unreimbursed expense of providing funeral or burial goods and services for a deceased indigent individual. Limits the amount of such expenses eligible for such credit to $3,000 in a taxable year for such an individual.
